pd.p:
Facial enhancement style options:
0: (Default) Female.
1: Male.
(2): The natural style beauty effect only makes minimal adjustments to facial features.

plentry.pd: The intensity of the facial enhancement style, with a value range oof [0.0,1.0]. The default value is 0.0, which means no face enhancement effect. The higher the value, the more obvious the facial enhancement effect.
